Text: Lies, you say? All he does is put a microphone in front of different people, and let them talk. The filmmaker is a peace activist, he asks for tolerance. The film isn't anti anybody.

For those wondering about the above comment, I was responding to a hit-and-run artist who posted something nasty and then erased the account, causing it to disappear. Serves me right for responding to a troll, I guess.
Uh-huh. Tell me, Zakimar, have you SEEN the film?
Thanks! Looks like the first sensible documentary on the subject. I've been looking for something like this. Thank you and God bless.
Good to see this torrent.  I've run across people sharing the actual Protocols and was appalled by their racist bias.  Thanks for all you share Rambam
